mapper.sql: a.id, a.dosage_no, a.dosage_date, a.total_sum, a.total_price, a.patient_info, a.patient_detail_info, a.exe_dept_id, a.exe_dept_name, a.opr_dept_id, a.opr_dept_name, a.surgeon_id, a.surgeon_name, a.sqrt_doctor_id, a.sqrt_doctor_name, a.in_hospital_no, a.dosage_by, a.subordinate_ward_id, a.subordinate_ward_name, a.outpatient_number, a.operative_number, a.display_flag, a.hy_charged, a.create_by, a.create_time, a.update_by, a.update_time, a.sys_org_code, a.remarks, a.depart_id, a.depart_parent_id, a.del_flag

pp.id, pp.number, pp.name as productName, pp.py, pp.wb, pp.bname, pp.bpy, pp.bwb, pp.zdy, pp.spec, pp.version, pp.unit_id, pp.power, pp.category_one, pp.category_two, pp.group_id, pp.vender_id, pp.supplier_id, pp.purchase_price, pp.selling_price, pp.registration, pp.description, pp.is_charge, pp.charge_code, pp.is_urgent, pp.up_quantity, pp.purchased_quantity, pp.create_by, pp.create_time, pp.update_by, pp.update_time, pp.sys_org_code, pp.remarks, pp.jde_code, pp.validity_flag, pp.del_flag

dd.id AS "pdDosageDetailId", dd.product_bar_code AS "productBarCode", dd.batch_no AS "batchNo", dd.exp_date AS "expDate", dd.dosage_count AS "dosageCount", dd.hy_charged AS "dhyCharged", dd.charge_code AS "chargeCode"
LEFT JOIN pd_dosage_detail dd on a.id = dd.dosage_id
left join pd_supplier e on pp.supplier_id = e.id

mapper.select: select IFNULL(d.name,'其他') as x, sum(a.total_price) as y, sum(a.total_sum) as z from pd_dosage a left join pd_dosage_detail b on a.id=b.dosage_id left join pd_product c on b.product_id=c.id left join pd_category d on d.id=c.category_two where a.del_flag='0' AND DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) <= date(a.dosage_date) and date(a.dosage_date) <=CURDATE() group by x order by y desc
